item.title: The Crepe Company
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
When it comes to crepes, I usually think some sort of delicious dessert concoction involving fruit. The Crepe Company offers the traditional, and then takes everything to a whole other level. Pictured above is a crepe filled with ham, mozzarella, lettuce and a chipotle mayo. Not pictured but also enjoyed were a turkey with cheddar, […]

The post The Crepe Company appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
When it comes to crepes, I usually think some sort of delicious dessert concoction involving fruit. The Crepe Company offers the traditional, and then takes everything to a whole other level.

Pictured above is a crepe filled with ham, mozzarella, lettuce and a chipotle mayo. Not pictured but also enjoyed were a turkey with cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato and chipotle mayo; a s’mores with Nutella, marshmallow, chocolate sauce and crushed graham crackers; and a raspberry cream cheese mixture.

The “entrée” crepes are very good alternatives to a sandwich. The crepe is nice and warm and very flavorful and makes the included toppings that much better. The dessert crepes are so sweet, they’re the perfect compliment to the entrées. And, as light as the crepes are, it’s very easy to justify having one of each.

You can find The Crepe Company by following them on Twitter or visiting their website.

The post The Crepe Company appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
